properties.name: send_billing_address
properties.description: Send billing address to Hexopay. Default is true.

properties.name: auto_return
properties.description: Number of seconds Hexopay will show its result page. Infinite if not specified.

properties.name: payment_description
properties.description: The payment short description that will appear in the Hexopay backoffice transaction data.

properties.name: expired_after
properties.description: Time specified in ms after start of transaction before it will will be expired on the Hexopay side. Default is 24 hours. Should be less then ttl.

properties.name: handle_widget_redirect
properties.description: Handle Hexopay widget redirect on Lithium side.

properties.name: avs_reject_codes
properties.description: Those AVS codes will be sent to Hexopay. Payment will be failed in case of match of AVS verification results to one of these codes.

properties.name: cvc_reject_codes
properties.description: Those CVC codes will be sent to Hexopay. Payment will be failed in case of match of CVV verification results to one of these codes.
